properties.name: longboard.upwork.client.key
properties.description: The client key to be used by when connecting to UpWork.

properties.name: longboard.upwork.client.secret
properties.description: The client secret to be used by when connecting to UpWork.

properties.name: longboard.upwork.token.value
properties.description: The user token to be used by when connecting to UpWork.

properties.name: longboard.upwork.token.secret
properties.description: The user secret to be used by when connecting to UpWork.

properties.name: longboard.upwork.params.earnings.fields
properties.description: A comma separate list of fields to be selected by default when querying the UpWork Earnings Report API.
